name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: AiHome新标签页-免费使用前沿GPT
name.en: AiHome New Tab - Free Access to Cutting-Edge ChatGPT

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 免费版ChatGPT，随时随地进行高级 AI 搜索、阅读和写作，提升工作效率。
short.en: Free ChatGPT: Enhance productivity with advanced AI search, reading, and writing, anytime, anywhere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
AiHome，自由免费使用GPT，是您必备的生成式 AI 扩展工具，一键释放人工智能魔法，让你的工作效率提高 10 倍。

①人工智能写作
- 改进写作
- 修正拼写，语法
- 解释编写代码
- Markdown渲染
- 缩短文本长度
- 扩写文本内容
- 润色文本语言
- 翻译各种语言
- 生成各类脚本
- 扮演各类角色

②人工智能阅读助手
- 解释任何单词、术语或段落
- 总结，分析任何文本
- 查找任何文本中的操作项目

③包括的更多功能
✔️ 保存聊天记录
✔️ 免费GPT，支持互联网访问和搜索结果（网页浏览）
✔️ 支持百度、雅虎、必应等不同的搜索引擎快捷搜索
✔️ 登录以同步您的所有账户设置和自定义提示
✔️ 智能写作
✔️ Markdown 渲染
✔️ 代码高亮
✔️ 为程序员解释代码
✔️ 翻译成任何语言
✔️ 阅读分析文本内容
✔️ 扩展内容
✔️ 天气/日历/倒计时/纪念日等多款小组件

AiHome利用人工智能帮助您更快更好地在线阅读和写作，语法检查、解释、总结分析、人工智能聊天、ai写作、搜索等，利用人工智能简化您的工作，节省大量时间，同时生成更好的结果
long.en:
AiHome, a freely accessible ChatGPT, is an indispensable generative AI extension tool that unleashes the magic of artificial intelligence with a single click, increasing your work efficiency by 10 times.

1. Artificial Intelligence Writing
- Improve writing
- Correct spelling and grammar
- Explain writing code
- Markdown rendering
- Shorten text length
- Expand text content
- Polish text language
- Translate various languages
- Generate various scripts
- Play various roles

2. Artificial Intelligence Reading Assistant
- Explain any word, term, or paragraph
- Summarize and analyze any text
- Find action items in any text

3. More included features
✔️ Save chat history
✔️ Free ChatGPT, supports internet access and search results (web browsing)
✔️ No OpenAI account required
✔️ Log in to synchronize all your account settings and custom prompts
✔️ Smart writing
✔️ Markdown rendering
✔️ Code highlighting
✔️ Explain code for programmers
✔️ Translate into any language
✔️ Read and analyze text content
✔️ Extended content
✔️ A variety of widgets such as weather/calendar/countdown/anniversary, etc.

AiHome uses artificial intelligence to help you read and write online faster and better, with grammar checking, explanation, summarization and analysis, artificial intelligence chat, AI writing, search, etc., simplifying your work with artificial intelligence, saving a lot of time, while generating better results.
